inclusion.criterion: Presence of LUTS for at least 3 months
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Bladder outlet obstruction confirmed by pressure-flow study (BOOI > 20)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Prostate volume measured by TRUS ≥ 30ml and < 100ml
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Able to comply with the prescribed treatment protocol and evaluations.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Patients with prostate or bladder cancer
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patients underwent urethral, prostate or bladder neck surgery
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patients with urethral stricture or bladder neck contracture
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Serum PSA≥4ng/ml (if the patient confirmed as no malignancy by prostate biopsy can be included).
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patients who medicated with 5ARI within 6 months
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patients who do not agree with the informed consent
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient is a 55 year old man visiting his primary care physician for lower urinary tract symptoms including frequency, urgency, weak stream, incomplete emptying and intermittent flow for the past 9 months.
